information_for_contributors: This file has been converted from https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript-TmLanguage/blob/master/TypeScript.tmLanguage
If you want to provide a fix or improvement, please create a pull request against the original repository.
Once accepted there, we are happy to receive an update request.
name: CtsScript

patterns.name: meta.var-single-variable.expr.cts
patterns.begin:
(?x)([_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*)(?=\s*
# function assignment |
(=\s*(
  ((async\s+|异步\s+)?(
    (function\s*[(<*]|函数\s*[(<*]) |
    (function\s+|函数\s+) |
    ([_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s*=>)
  )) |
  ((async\s*|异步\s*)?(
    # sure shot arrow functions even if => is on new line
(
  [(]\s*
  (
    ([)]\s*:) |                                                                 # ():
    ((\.\.\.\s*)?[_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s*:)                                            # [(]param: | [(]...param:
  )
) |
(
  [<]\s*[_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s+extends\s*[^=>]                                        # < typeparam extends
) |
# arrow function possible to detect only with => on same line
(
  (<\s*[_$[:alpha:]\{\(\[]([^<>=]|=[^<]|\<\s*[_$[:alpha:]\{\(\[]([^=<>]|=[^<])+\>)+>\s*)?                                                           # typeparameters
  \(\s*([_$[:alpha:]\{\[]([^()]|\((\s*[^()]*)?\))*)?\)                          # parameteres
  (\s*:\s*([^<>\(\)]|\<[^<>]+\>|\([^\(\)]+\))+)?                                # return type
  \s*=>                                                                         # arrow operator
)
  ))
)) |
# typeannotation is fn type: < | () | (... | (param: | (param, | (param? | (param= | (param) =>
(:\s*(
  (<) |
  ([(]\s*(
    ([)]) |
    (\.\.\.) |
    ([_$[:alnum:]]+\s*(
      ([:,?=])|
      ([)]\s*=>)
    ))
  ))
)))

patterns.match: \s*\b(public|公开|protected|保护|private|私有|readonly|只读)(?=\s+(public|公开|protected|保护|private|私有|readonly|只读)\s+)

(?x)(?:\s*\b(public|公开|private|私有|protected|保护|readonly|只读)\s+)?(\.\.\.)?\s*(?<!=|:)(?:(this|本体)|([_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*))\s*(\??)(?=\s*
# function assignment |
(=\s*(
  ((async\s+|异步\s+)?(
    (function\s*[(<*]|函数\s*[(<*]) |
    (function\s+|函数\s+) |
    (function\s+|函数\s+) |
    ([_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s*=>)
  )) |
  ((async\s*|异步\s*)?(
    # sure shot arrow functions even if => is on new line
(
  [(]\s*
  (
    ([)]\s*:) |                                                                 # ():
    ((\.\.\.\s*)?[_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s*:)                                            # [(]param: | [(]...param:
  )
) |
(
  [<]\s*[_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s+extends\s*[^=>]                                        # < typeparam extends

  [<]\s*[_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s+扩展\s*[^=>]                                        # < typeparam extends
) |
# arrow function possible to detect only with => on same line
(
  (<\s*[_$[:alpha:]\{\(\[]([^<>=]|=[^<]|\<\s*[_$[:alpha:]\{\(\[]([^=<>]|=[^<])+\>)+>\s*)?                                                           # typeparameters
  \(\s*([_$[:alpha:]\{\[]([^()]|\((\s*[^()]*)?\))*)?\)                          # parameteres
  (\s*:\s*([^<>\(\)]|\<[^<>]+\>|\([^\(\)]+\))+)?                                # return type
  \s*=>                                                                         # arrow operator
)
  ))
)) |
# typeannotation is fn type: < | () | (... | (param: | (param, | (param? | (param= | (param) =>
(:\s*(
  (<) |
  ([(]\s*(
    ([)]) |
    (\.\.\.) |
    ([_$[:alnum:]]+\s*(
      ([:,?=])|
      ([)]\s*=>)
    ))
  ))
)))

patterns.name: meta.definition.property.cts entity.name.function.cts
patterns.match:
(?x)([_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*)(?=(\?\s*)?\s*
# function assignment |
(=\s*(
  ((async\s+|异步\s+)?(
    (function\s*[(<*]|函数\s*[(<*]) |
    (function\s+|函数\s+) |
    ([_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s*=>)
  )) |
  ((async\s*|异步\s*)?(
    # sure shot arrow functions even if => is on new line
(
  [(]\s*
  (
    ([)]\s*:) |                                                                 # ():
    ((\.\.\.\s*)?[_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s*:)                                            # [(]param: | [(]...param:
  )
) |
(
  [<]\s*[_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s+extends\s*[^=>]                                        # < typeparam extends
|
  [<]\s*[_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s+扩展\s*[^=>]                                        # < typeparam extends
) |
# arrow function possible to detect only with => on same line
(
  (<\s*[_$[:alpha:]\{\(\[]([^<>=]|=[^<]|\<\s*[_$[:alpha:]\{\(\[]([^=<>]|=[^<])+\>)+>\s*)?                                                           # typeparameters
  \(\s*([_$[:alpha:]\{\[]([^()]|\((\s*[^()]*)?\))*)?\)                          # parameteres
  (\s*:\s*([^<>\(\)]|\<[^<>]+\>|\([^\(\)]+\))+)?                                # return type
  \s*=>                                                                         # arrow operator
)
  ))
)) |
# typeannotation is fn type: < | () | (... | (param: | (param, | (param? | (param= | (param) =>
(:\s*(
  (<) |
  ([(]\s*(
    ([)]) |
    (\.\.\.) |
    ([_$[:alnum:]]+\s*(
      ([:,?=])|
      ([)]\s*=>)
    ))
  ))
)))

patterns.name: meta.arrow.cts
patterns.begin:
(?x) (?:
  (?<!\.|\$)(\basync|\b异步)
)? ((?<![})!\]])\s*
  (?=
    # sure shot arrow functions even if => is on new line
(
  [(]\s*
  (
    ([)]\s*:) |                                                                 # ():
    ((\.\.\.\s*)?[_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s*:)                                            # [(]param: | [(]...param:
  )
) |
(
  [<]\s*[_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s+extends\s*[^=>]                                        # < typeparam extends
|
  [<]\s*[_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s+扩展\s*[^=>]                                        # < typeparam extends
) |
# arrow function possible to detect only with => on same line
(
  (<\s*[_$[:alpha:]\{\(\[]([^<>=]|=[^<]|\<\s*[_$[:alpha:]\{\(\[]([^=<>]|=[^<])+\>)+>\s*)?                                                           # typeparameters
  \(\s*([_$[:alpha:]\{\[]([^()]|\((\s*[^()]*)?\))*)?\)                          # parameteres
  (\s*:\s*([^<>\(\)]|\<[^<>]+\>|\([^\(\)]+\))+)?                                # return type
  \s*=>                                                                         # arrow operator
)
  )
)
patterns.end: (?==>|\{|(^\s*(export|function|class|interface|let|var|const|import|enum|namespace|module|type|abstract|declare|导出|函数|类|类别|接口|变量|值量|常量|导入|枚举|名域|抽象|声明)\s+))

access-modifier.name: storage.modifier.cts
access-modifier.match: (?<!\.|\$)\b(抽象|公开|保护|私有|只读|静态|abstract|public|protected|private|readonly|static)\b(?!\$|\.)

namespace-declaration.name: meta.namespace.declaration.cts
namespace-declaration.end: (?<=\})|(?=;|\b抽象\b|\b异步\b|\b类\b|\b类别\b|\b常量\b|\b声明\b|\b枚举\b|\b导出\b|\b函数\b|\b导入\b|\b接口\b|\b变量\b|\b模块\b|\b名域\b|\b类型\b|\b值量\b|\b抽象\b|\b异步\b|\b类\b|\b类别\b|\b常量\b|\b声明\b|\b枚举\b|\b导出\b|\b函数\b|\b导入\b|\b接口\b|\b变量\b|\b模块\b|\b名域\b|\b类型\b|\b值量\b|\babstract\b|\basync\b|\bclass\b|\bconst\b|\bdeclare\b|\benum\b|\bexport\b|\bfunction\b|\bimport\b|\binterface\b|\blet\b|\bmodule\b|\bnamespace\b|\btype\b|\bvar\b)

type-alias-declaration.name: meta.type.declaration.cts
type-alias-declaration.end: (?=[};]|\b抽象\b|\b异步\b|\b类\b|\b类别\b|\b常量\b|\b声明\b|\b枚举\b|\b导出\b|\b函数\b|\b导入\b|\b接口\b|\b变量\b|\b模块\b|\b名域\b|\b类型\b|\b值量\b|\babstract\b|\basync\b|\bclass\b|\bconst\b|\bdeclare\b|\benum\b|\bexport\b|\bfunction\b|\bimport\b|\binterface\b|\blet\b|\bmodule\b|\bnamespace\b|\btype\b|\bvar\b)

patterns.name: meta.export.default.cts
patterns.end: (?=;|$|\b抽象\b|\b异步\b|\b类\b|\b类别\b|\b常量\b|\b声明\b|\b枚举\b|\b导出\b|\b函数\b|\b导入\b|\b接口\b|\b变量\b|\b模块\b|\b名域\b|\b类型\b|\b值量\b|\babstract\b|\basync\b|\bclass\b|\bconst\b|\bdeclare\b|\benum\b|\bexport\b|\bfunction\b|\bimport\b|\binterface\b|\blet\b|\bmodule\b|\bnamespace\b|\btype\b|\bvar\b)

patterns.name: meta.export.cts
patterns.end: (?=;|$|\b抽象\b|\b异步\b|\b类\b|\b类别\b|\b常量\b|\b声明\b|\b枚举\b|\b导出\b|\b函数\b|\b导入\b|\b接口\b|\b变量\b|\b模块\b|\b名域\b|\b类型\b|\b值量\b|\babstract\b|\basync\b|\bclass\b|\bconst\b|\bdeclare\b|\benum\b|\bexport\b|\bfunction\b|\bimport\b|\binterface\b|\blet\b|\bmodule\b|\bnamespace\b|\btype\b|\bvar\b)

after-operator-block-as-object-literal.name: meta.objectliteral.cts
after-operator-block-as-object-literal.begin: (?<=[=(,\[?+!]|await|等待|返回|获得|抛出|位于|属于|类为|return|yield|throw|in|of|typeof|&&|\|\||\*)\s*(\{)

patterns.name: meta.object.member.cts
patterns.match:
(?x)(?:([_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*)\s*(?=:\s*(
  ((async\s+|异步\s+)?(
    (function\s*[(<*]|函数\s*[(<*]) |
    (function\s+|函数\s+) |
    ([_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s*=>)
  )) |
  ((async\s*|异步\s*)?(
    # sure shot arrow functions even if => is on new line
(
  [(]\s*
  (
    ([)]\s*:) |                                                                 # ():
    ((\.\.\.\s*)?[_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s*:)                                            # [(]param: | [(]...param:
  )
) |
(
  [<]\s*[_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s+extends\s*[^=>]                                        # < typeparam extends
) |
# arrow function possible to detect only with => on same line
(
  (<\s*[_$[:alpha:]\{\(\[]([^<>=]|=[^<]|\<\s*[_$[:alpha:]\{\(\[]([^=<>]|=[^<])+\>)+>\s*)?                                                           # typeparameters
  \(\s*([_$[:alpha:]\{\[]([^()]|\((\s*[^()]*)?\))*)?\)                          # parameteres
  (\s*:\s*([^<>\(\)]|\<[^<>]+\>|\([^\(\)]+\))+)?                                # return type
  \s*=>                                                                         # arrow operator
)
  ))
)))
(?<!\.|\$)\b(?:(exports|出口)|(module|模块)(?:(\.)(exports|出口|ID|文件名|加载|父|子|id|filename|loaded|parent|children))?)\b(?!\$)

patterns.name: support.variable.object.node.cts
patterns.match: (?<!\.|\$)\b(global|全局|_全局_|根|__当前目录|_当前文件目录|GLOBAL|root|__dirname|__filename)\b(?!\$)

(?x)(?:(\.)\s*)?([_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*)(?=\s*=\s*(
  ((async\s+|异步\s+)?(
    (function\s*[(<*]|函数\s*[(<*]) |
    (function\s+|函数\s+) |
    ([_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s*=>)
  )) |
  ((async\s*|异步\s*)?(
    # sure shot arrow functions even if => is on new line
(
  [(]\s*
  (
    ([)]\s*:) |                                                                 # ():
    ((\.\.\.\s*)?[_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s*:)                                            # [(]param: | [(]...param:
  )
) |
(
  [<]\s*[_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s+extends\s*[^=>]                                        # < typeparam extends
|
  [<]\s*[_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*\s+扩展\s*[^=>]                                        # < typeparam extends
) |
# arrow function possible to detect only with => on same line
(
  (<\s*[_$[:alpha:]\{\(\[]([^<>=]|=[^<]|\<\s*[_$[:alpha:]\{\(\[]([^=<>]|=[^<])+\>)+>\s*)?                                                           # typeparameters
  \(\s*([_$[:alpha:]\{\[]([^()]|\((\s*[^()]*)?\))*)?\)                          # parameteres
  (\s*:\s*([^<>\(\)]|\<[^<>]+\>|\([^\(\)]+\))+)?                                # return type
  \s*=>                                                                         # arrow operator
)
  ))
))

arrow-return-type.name: meta.return.type.arrow.cts
arrow-return-type.end: (?==>|\{|(^\s*(导出|函数|类|类别|接口|变量|值量|常量|导入|枚举|名域|模块|类型|抽象|声明|export|function|class|interface|let|var|const|import|enum|namespace|module|type|abstract|declare)\s+))

type-primitive.name: support.type.primitive.cts
type-primitive.match: (?<!\.|\$)\b(文字|数字|真假|符号|任意|无值|不及|string|number|boolean|symbol|any|void|never)\b(?!\$|\.)

type-builtin-literals.name: support.type.builtin.cts
type-builtin-literals.match: (?<!\.|\$)\b(本体|为真|真的|真|为假|假的|假|未定|空值|实例|this|true|false|undefined|null|object)\b(?!\$|\.)

directives.name: comment.line.triple-slash.directive.cts
directives.begin: ^(///)\s*(?=<(reference|引用|AMD附件|AMD模块|amd-dependency|amd-module)(\s+(path|路径|类型集|不使用默认支持库|名称|types|no-default-lib|name)\s*=\s*((\'([^\'\\]|\\\'|\\)*\')|(\"([^\"\\]|\\\"|\\)*\")))+\s*/>\s*$)

patterns.name: entity.other.attribute-name.directive.cts
patterns.match: path|路径|类型集|不使用默认支持库|名称|types|no-default-lib|name
(?x) ((@)kind|(@)标识) \s+ (类|常数|事件|外部|文件|函数|成员|最大|模块|名域|类型定义|class|constant|event|external|file|function|member|mixin|module|namespace|typedef) \b

(?x)
((@)see|(@)详见)
\s+
(?:
  # URL
  (
    (?=https?://)
    (?:[^\s*]|\*[^/])+
  )
  |
  # JSDoc namepath
  (
    (?!
      # Avoid matching bare URIs (also acceptable as links)
      https?://
      |
      # Avoid matching {@inline tags}; we match those below
      (?:\[[^\[\]]*\])? # Possible description [preceding]{@tag}
      {@(?:link|链接|代码链接|片段链接|教程|linkcode|linkplain|tutorial)\b
    )
    # Matched namepath
    (?:[^@\s*/]|\*[^/])+
  )
)

(?x)
((@)template|(@)模板)
\s+
# One or more valid identifiers
(
  [A-Za-z_$]         # First character: non-numeric word character
  [\w$.\[\]]*        # Rest of identifier
  (?:                # Possible list of additional identifiers
    \s* , \s*
    [A-Za-z_$]
    [\w$.\[\]]*
  )*
)

(?x)
(
  (@)
  (?:arg|参数|增强参数|常量|常数|成员|名域|变量|argument|const|constant|member|namespace|param|var)
)
\s+
(
  [A-Za-z_$]
  [\w$.\[\]]*
)

patterns.begin: ((@)(?:arg|参数|增强参数|常量|常数|成员|名域|属性|原型|变量|argument|const|constant|member|namespace|param|prop|property|var))\s+(?={)

patterns.name: variable.other.jsdoc
patterns.match:
(?x)
(\[)\s*
[\w$]+
(?:
  (?:\[\])?                                        # Foo[ ].bar properties within an array
  \.                                                # Foo.Bar namespaced parameter
  [\w$]+
)*
(?:
  \s*
  (=)                                                # [foo=bar] Default parameter value
  \s*
  (
    # The inner regexes are to stop the match early at */ and to not stop at escaped quotes
    (?>
      "(?:(?:\*(?!/))|(?:\\(?!"))|[^*\\])*?" |                      # [foo="bar"] Double-quoted
      '(?:(?:\*(?!/))|(?:\\(?!'))|[^*\\])*?' |                      # [foo='bar'] Single-quoted
      \[ (?:(?:\*(?!/))|[^*])*? \] |                                # [foo=[1,2]] Array literal
      (?:(?:\*(?!/))|\s(?!\s*\])|\[.*?(?:\]|(?=\*/))|[^*\s\[\]])*   # Everything else
    )*
  )
)?
\s*(?:(\])((?:[^*\s]|\*[^\s/])+)?|(?=\*/))

patterns.begin:
(?x)
(
  (@)
  (?:定义|枚举|外部|导出|扩展|实现|修饰|标记|define|enum|exception|export|extends|lends|implements|modifies
  |namespace|private|protected|returns?|suppress|this|throws|type
  |yields?)
)
\s+(?={)

patterns.match:
(?x)
(
  (@)
  (?:别名|增强参数|回调|构造|输出|事件|文件集|出口集?|alias|augments|callback|constructs|emits|event|fires|exports?
  |扩展|外部|函数|主机|标记|列表|接口|修饰|extends|external|function|func|host|lends|listens|interface|memberof!?
  |成员|模块|最小|最大|名称|需要|详见|类型定义|使用|method|module|mixes|mixin|name|requires|see|this|typedef|uses)
)
\s+
(
  (?:
    [^{}@\s*] | \*[^/]
  )+
)
((@)(?:default|默认(?:value|值)?|license|许可证|教程|版本|变量|tutorial|variation|version))\s+([^\s*]+)

patterns.name: storage.type.class.jsdoc
patterns.match: (?x) (@) (?:abstract|抽象|别名|API|参数|增强参数|异步|人口|特性|access|alias|api|arg|argument|async|attribute|augments|作者|引用|author|beta|borrows|bubbles |回调|类|类别|代码|配置|常数|常量|构造|版权|默认|默认值|callback|chainable|class|classdesc|code|config|const|constant|constructor|constructs|copyright |default|defaultvalue|定义|词典|输出|枚举|外部|出口|define|deprecated|desc|description|dict|emits|enum|event|example|exception |exports?|扩展|extends|extension(?:_?for)?|external|外部|externs|file|fileoverview|final|fires|for|func |函数|引擎|全局|隐藏构造|主机|忽略|实现|隐式转换|function|generator|global|hideconstructor|host|ignore|implements|implicitCast|inherit[Dd]oc |inner|接口|instance|interface|internal|内部|kind|标记|许可证|主函数|成员|成员在|lends|license|listens|main|member|memberof!?|method |mixes|mixins?|modifies|模块|名称|名域|无构造|module|name|namespace|noalias|nocollapse|nocompile|nosideeffects |重载|参数|override|overview|package|param|polymer(?:Behavior)?|私有|保护|属性|特性|原型|公开|只读|preserve|private|prop|property|protected |public|read[Oo]nly|record|require[ds]|returns?|详见|静态|结构|see|since|static|struct|submodule|summary |suppress|template|this|本体|throws|抛出|todo|任务|教程|tutorial|type|类型|typedef|类型定义|未定义|unrestricted|使用|uses|var|变量|variation |版本|version|virtual|writeOnce|获得|yields?) \b

patterns.name: constant.other.description.jsdoc
patterns.match: (\[)[^\]]+(\])(?={@(?:link|链接|链接代码|链接片段|教程|linkcode|linkplain|tutorial))
